thaneanthem,

You may have more luck looking at the released code
(http://g=
ithub.com/KentBeck/junit/tree/r4.8.2).  Documentation at HEAD
is lagging a =
bit, as the implementation settles down.  TestRule is the
current proposed =
replacement for MethodRule, and we'll write it up
better if it proves an im=
provement.

   David Saff
